# completionDate

**Instance Property**

The date when all recipients of the exchange request reply.

## Declaration

```swift
var completionDate: Date? { get }
```

## Discussion

The date the exchange [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKTurnBasedExchange/status] property becomes [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKTurnBasedExchangeStatus/complete].

## Replying to Exchange Requests

- **reply(withLocalizableMessageKey:arguments:data:completionHandler:)**: Replies to an exchange request on behalf of a recipient.
- **replies**: The replies from recipients of the exchange request.
- **status**: The status of the exchange request.
- **GKTurnBasedExchangeStatus**: The status of an exchange or reply.
